channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Deftones Announce First Album in Five Years, Drop New Song
item.description: 🎸 Deftones are back and better than ever! 🤘 Let's rock out to their new song together! 🎶 #Deftones #NewMusic

item.title: Polaris Music Prize Announces 2025 Shortlist
item.description: 🚀 Exciting vibes ahead! Which album do you think will take home the crown? 🎶 #PolarisPrize2025 #MusicNews

item.title: Dan Deacon Performs a Mesmerizing “Star Spangled Banner” at Baltimore Orioles Game: Watch
item.description: 🌟 Dan Deacon dazzles with his unique twist on the national anthem! 🎶 Watch his electrifying performance at the Orioles game! ⚾ #DanDeacon #MusicMagic

item.title: Ghost Kick Off Summer US Arena Tour in Baltimore with 22-Song Set: Photos + Setlist
item.description: 👻🎸 Rocking vibes in Baltimore! Ghost's epic arena tour starts strong with a 22-song setlist. Check out the photos! 🎶🤘 #GhostTourKickoff

item.title: G Flip Will Channel ‘Butch Springsteen’ on Eighties-Inspired Album ‘Dream Ride’
item.description: 🚀 Get ready to rock out with G Flip's 'Butch Springsteen' vibes on the new album 'Dream Ride'! 🎶 #GFlip #DreamRide
